content: {"name": "Operation Reach Out", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Call first to have an appointment and verify if you are eligible.", "email": "", "url": "http://www.opreachout.org/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "1308 Miller Street", "address_2": null, "city": "Monroe", "state_province": "NC", "postal_code": "28110", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 34.9935942, "longitude": -80.5465804}, "phones": [{"number": "(704) 289-4237", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "15:00"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "15:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "15:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "15:00"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "15:00"}, {"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "16:30", "closes_at": "17:00"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "16:30", "closes_at": "17:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "16:30", "closes_at": "17:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "16:30", "closes_at": "17:00"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "16:30", "closes_at": "17:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "ID required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Appointments required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Food pantry: Needs to fill out a form"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Clothing may be available"}]}
